Author: insanityiskey85-create
Name: AI NUNU v2.0
Description: An advanced AI companion plugin for FFXIV that integrates with Ollama to provide lore-friendly chat with memory, personality, and emotional responses. Features include persistent conversations, character memory system, immersive roleplay experience, and a full-featured chat interface with infinite conversation history.
Punchline: AI Companion with Memory & Personality for FFXIV
Changelog: Initial release of AI NUNU v2.0 with chat window, memory system, Ollama integration, and infinite conversation history
